communication.message:
As the Retailer, I have 91 units in inventory and 0 units in backlog. My recent profit has been $35.9, and my total profit so far is $235.90. I believe we can work together to maximize the overall supply chain profitability. 

To start, I propose that we all aim to maintain a 1-round inventory cover to prevent stockouts and minimize holding/backlog costs. This will require close coordination on order quantities and production planning. I'm willing to share my inventory status and order plans transparently if the other agents do the same. 

By working together, we can avoid the bullwhip effect and keep the supply chain stable. This will benefit everyone's profits in the long run. I'm confident that with open communication and a collaborative approach, we can achieve this goal.
